forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. South wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. Southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Boston unfolds with a gentle clarity, where the sun, it seems, has opted to peek through the veil of clouds, casting a soft glow over the city. At a high of 67, the warmth begins a slow descent into a more temperate embrace as the day wanes. A light breeze from the south carries whispers of autumn, fanning the leaves into a muted dance, their colors reflecting the season's transition. As evening approaches, the temperature dips, promising a mild night ahead with a soft cover of clouds allowing for glimpses of stars, should the moon choose to join the canvas. 

Dress in layers, perhaps a light sweater to accompany your afternoon stroll, and as the sun sinks lower, a cozy jacket will serve you well. This late October day invites leisurely pursuits—take a stroll along the Charles River, savor a cup of warm cider from a local market, or perhaps curl up with a good book at your favorite café, as the ambiance shifts subtly from day to evening. With the temperate air brushing against your skin, it’s a perfect time to soak in the tranquil rhythm of city life, all the while wrapped in the gentle embrace of an autumn afternoon.
